traits.label: fullscreen
traits.name: :fullscreen
traits.desc: Fullscreen mode

traits.label: no-route-fullscreen-exit
traits.name: :no-route-fullscreen-exit
traits.desc: Changing route app won't exit fullscreen

traits.label: model-value
traits.name: :model-value
traits.desc: Model of the component; Either use this property (along with a listener for 'update:modelValue' event) OR use v-model directive

traits.label: readonly
traits.name: :readonly
traits.desc: Put component in readonly mode

traits.label: square
traits.name: :square
traits.desc: Removes border-radius so borders are squared

traits.label: flat
traits.name: :flat
traits.desc: Applies a 'flat' design (no borders)

traits.label: dense
traits.name: :dense
traits.desc: Dense mode; toolbar buttons are shown on one-line only

traits.label: dark
traits.name: :dark
traits.desc: Notify the component that the background is a dark color

traits.label: disable
traits.name: :disable
traits.desc: Put component in disabled mode

traits.label: min-height
traits.name: :min-height
traits.desc: CSS unit for the minimum height of the editable area

traits.label: max-height
traits.name: :max-height
traits.desc: CSS unit for maximum height of the input area

traits.label: height
traits.name: :height
traits.desc: CSS value to set the height of the editable area

traits.label: definitions
traits.name: :definitions
traits.desc: Definition of commands and their buttons to be included in the 'toolbar' prop
examples: :definitions="{ save: { tip: 'Save your work', icon: 'save', label: 'Save', handler: saveWork }, upload: { tip: 'Upload to cloud', icon: 'cloud_upload', label: 'Upload', handler: uploadIt } }"

traits.label: fonts
traits.name: :fonts
traits.desc: Object with definitions of fonts
examples: :fonts="{ arial: 'Arial', arial_black: 'Arial Black', comic_sans: 'Comic Sans MS' }"

traits.label: toolbar
traits.name: :toolbar
traits.desc: An array of arrays of Objects/Strings that you use to define the construction of the elements and commands available in the toolbar

traits.label: toolbar-color
traits.name: :toolbar-color
traits.desc: Font color (from the Quasar Palette) of buttons and text in the toolbar

traits.label: toolbar-text-color
traits.name: :toolbar-text-color
traits.desc: Text color (from the Quasar Palette) of toolbar commands

traits.label: toolbar-toggle-color
traits.name: :toolbar-toggle-color
traits.desc: Choose the active color (from the Quasar Palette) of toolbar commands button

traits.label: toolbar-bg
traits.name: :toolbar-bg
traits.desc: Toolbar background color (from Quasar Palette)

traits.label: toolbar-outline
traits.name: :toolbar-outline
traits.desc: Toolbar buttons are rendered "outlined"

traits.label: toolbar-push
traits.name: :toolbar-push
traits.desc: Toolbar buttons are rendered as a "push-button" type

traits.label: toolbar-rounded
traits.name: :toolbar-rounded
traits.desc: Toolbar buttons are rendered "rounded"

traits.label: paragraph-tag
traits.name: :paragraph-tag
traits.desc: Paragraph tag to be used

traits.label: content-style
traits.name: :content-style
traits.desc: Object with CSS properties and values for styling the container of QEditor

traits.label: content-class
traits.name: :content-class
traits.desc: CSS classes for the input area

traits.label: placeholder
traits.name: :placeholder
traits.desc: Text to display as placeholder
